title: MediCamp
description: A comprehensive web application for managing medical camp registrations and participant tracking, enhancing healthcare event coordination.
features: JWT authentication dashboard for users and organizers
Add and manage camp registrations with duplicate validation
Filter camps by location and status
Admin access for camp moderation and participant oversight

title: WhereIsIt
description: A platform where users can report and find lost items by posting details and locations. Includes login, item posting, and community support.

title: Garden Community
description: A gardening knowledge-sharing website where users can post and view gardening tips. It encourages collaboration among gardeners.

title: EventExplorer
description: A modern event booking web app where users can register, book seats, give feedback, and manage their profiles.
features: Register and Login via Email or Google
